snippet.title: Farmers Use Radishes To Soften, Fertilize Fields
snippet.description:
Farmers Use Radishes To Soften, Fertilize Fields
By The Associated Press 03:00 AM EDT 09/18/09
More farmers planting tillage radishes to nourish, soften fields; cut back fertilizer use
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10600260/1/farmers-use-radishes-to-soften-fertilize-fields.html

snippet.title: Delicious Twists on Rosh Hashanah Dishes
snippet.description:
Delicious Twists on Rosh Hashanah Dishes
By Danielle Sonnenberg 11:58 AM EDT 09/12/07
Chefs reveal their variations on holiday classics.
